value: Hum upar di gayi 5 values mei se justify-content ko koi bhi value de sakte hai.
Iski default yaani ki pehle se value flex-start hoti hai. Flex-start se flex items flex container ki shuruaat mein aa jate hai.
Iss example ko dekho aur container ki css mein justify-content ki value change karke dekho ki kya hota hai.
